title: Best Friends Forever Keyring, BFF Gift, Personalized with Two Initials and Red Heart
features: Handmade personalized gift for best friend
description: A perfect personalized gift for your best friend and you! The focal point is a beautiful stainless steel heart shaped charm with the words Best Friends Forever. I will attach both of your first initials on either side of the heart, along with a tiny red heart. Choose your initials at checkout. If you would like this keyring for each of you, choose 2 for Quantity in the drop-down menu. I attached the charms to a silvertone iron key ring which measures 1 1/8" in diameter and holds up to 6 keys. The center heart charm is about 7/8" tall and 3/4‚Äù wide.
